Grok is the model in the arena

It’s a great model. 

Proud of the @xAI team.

So xAI just released grok 4.1 and it's the best model ever created. Both in metrics and vibes. Gemini 3 is coming next.
What will happen to the OpenAI brand when they are constantly behind?

Grok 4.1 is also much better at writing.

On Creative Writing v3, Grok 4.1 scores 1722 Elo, a remarkable 600-point gain over our previous model.

Invertís mejor cuando lo hacés con especialistas. Con Balanz estás a un clic de distancia. Invertí fácil, invertí con Balanz.

Balanz, N°1 en inversiones. Necesitás Balanz.
